description: {"blocks":[{"key":"2n6gu","text":"This protocol describes the T/NK Immunosenescence Profiling Flow Cytometry Panel","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

groups.title: Cellular Senescence Network (SenNet) Method Development Community

materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"3aln6","text":"Reagents \u0026 Materials:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":21},{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":21},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6la9k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ttgq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d8ppb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7nskg","text":"Pipettes and Tips for 1-1000uL","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":30}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"acna","text":"96 Well Round Bottom Plates: Costar Cat #3799","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":29}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5pf5c","text":"Bullet Tubes: Costar Cat #4401","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c9gl5","text":"BSB Plus:BD Cat #566385","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dd35v","text":"TruStain FcX: BioLegend Cat #422302","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"529rh","text":"dPBS: Invitrogen Cat #: 41190-250","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3tpk5","text":"\n\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4ah56","text":"Thaw heat-inactivated FBS (hiFBS):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"242ng","text":"Thaw a 500mL Bottle of FBS at 4°C. This may require more than overnight so the 500mL Bottle may be removed 2 or 3 days prior to use. Do not leave the FBS at room temperature overnight.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dbhbo","text":"Aliquot the 500mL FBS Bottle in 50mL aliquots (a total of ten 50mL hi-FBS Aliquots)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"32lrm","text":"Label the aliquots with Batch#, Expiration Date, Aliquot Date","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"581uh","text":"Store 50mL aliquots @ -20ºC until expiration date or for up to 2 freeze/thaw cycles","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"15hn3","text":"FACS Wash w/ EDTA (D-PBS with 0.5% FBS + 2 mM EDTA): Invitrogen Cat # 41190-250","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":53}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3oorn","text":"Label the bottle with preparer's initials and expiration date (one month from preparation)\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2j0g2","text":"Label the aliquots with Batch#, Expiration Date, Aliquot Date","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ct7t4","text":"\n\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6aosk","text":"Label the bottle with preparer's initials and expiration date (one month from preparation)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"omkb","text":"Add 5 mL 10% Formalin to a sterile 50 mL centrifuge conical tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b13st","text":"Label the bottle with reagent name, initials \u0026 expiration date (one month from preparation)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9to3h","text":"Overview","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"93ur5","text":"Thaw cells and distribute to plates. Stain immediately, then acquire flow data.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eldna","text":"Thawing","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aed14","text":"        
1. Prepare 20ml of R10 in 50mL conical tube per sample (1-4 vials per tube)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9tag1","text":"       
2. Warm the R10 for 30 min at 37C prior to use","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ed7q","text":"      
3. Place cryovials in a 37C bath for 3-5 sec at a time. Withdraw, examine and repeat (usually 3-4 rounds) until small, pea-sized amount of ice remains","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f4j3g","text":"    
4. Spray with 70% EtOH and wipe off before returning to the hood","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5u7oq","text":"   
5. To each cryovial, add 1ml of R10 dropwise to each cryovial","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"96l97","text":"      
6. Transfer the 2ml PBMC sample from the cryovials into the 50ml conicals","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"84ijh","text":"       
7. Invert 3x to mix","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dvrbp","text":"     
8. Centrifuge at 350g for 10 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cgidd","text":"     
9. Pour off the supernatant, do not shake to allow some volume to remain","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1j3ei","text":"   
10. Gently swirl the 50mL conical in remaining volume to loosen pellet","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a1tr8","text":" 
11. Add 10mL pre-warmed R10 and resuspend by pipetting 10 times. Mix sample carefully but
thoroughly to break up any cell clumps.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7goj6","text":"   
12. Centrifuge at 350g for 10 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5jorj","text":"  
13. Pour off the supernatant, do not shake to allow some volume to remain","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a4ddu","text":"    
14. Gently swirl the 50mL conical in remaining volume to loosen pellet","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ejh4u","text":"  
15. Add 10mL pre-warmed R10 and resuspend by pipetting 10 times. Mix sample carefully but thoroughly to break up any cell clumps","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9rnpi","text":"
16. COUNTING & VIABILITY:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":5,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"efsn5","text":"a)      Perform a cell count using the Countess II to determine PBMC viability & recovery","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2vdol","text":"b)      Add 10uL Trypan Blue to well of mixing plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c4fdm","text":"c)      Add 10uL Cells, pipette up and down","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cvput","text":"d)      Remove 10uL of cell mix and dispense into Countess slide","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8o3a6","text":"e)      Wait 30 sec","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b3rsn","text":"f)       Insert into Countess II to calculate total cells and viability","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3v296","text":"
17. Centrifuge 350g x10 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9gtf6","text":"   
18. Decant supernatant and resuspend at 10x106 viable cells/mL R10","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":49,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1j56f","text":"  
19. Aliquot 100uL of cells per well to plate (1x106 cells/well) for immediate staining","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":53,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fomm6","text":"Staining","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"arflk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"74bo4","text":"Keep everything as cold as much as possible","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"55rnh","text":"Keep everything covered as much as possible; work in dark or incandescent light","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eikir","text":"      
1. Centrifuge (400 x 3 min)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"52k5l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8p7p0","text":"2. Flick off supernatant and vortex gently","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"27u7e","text":"      
3. Add 47.5uL FACS wash to each well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dbslu","text":"       
4. Add 2.5uL TruStain FCX blocking to each well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7duo0","text":"     
5. Incubate at 4C for 15 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ge4k","text":"       
6. Prepare experiment-specific surface stain antibody mix in PBS with 10uL BSB Plus, set aside","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9e4a5","text":"       
7. Add 100uL of antibody mix to each well and gently vortex","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7r0ri","text":"       
8. Incubate in 4C fridge for 30 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":37,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"al9a3","text":"
9. Add 100uL FACS wash to each well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1tecj","text":"     
10. Centrifuge (400g x 3 min)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"68tnh","text":"   
11. Flick off supernatant and vortex gently","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cm6qm","text":"
12. Add 200uL FACS wash to each well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7qp4t","text":"
13. Centrifuge (400g x 3 min)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"95rcn","text":"   
14. Flick off supernatant and vortex gently","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"62hnh","text":"
15. Add 200uL FACS wash to each well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"424b3","text":" 
16. Centrifuge (400g x 3 min)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fbivg","text":" 
17. Flick off supernatant and vortex gently","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"93b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4silv","text":"18. Add 200uL 1% PFA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7heeh","text":"  
19. Transfer samples to bullet tubes, cover with aluminum foil, store at 4°C, & acquire within 6 hours","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1m39o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"q9u6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"30cku","text":"
